# CUTSCENE::SET_VEHICLE_MODEL_PLAYER_WILL_EXIT_SCENE

## Summary
Tells the cut scene what vehicle the player will exit in so we can compute the correct view mode

## Parameters
* **MODEL_NAMES** model

## Useful links
- [VHub: Vehicles](https://vhub.wiki/vehicles)
